messages.message: Brian, How have you been? I'm launching a website for my new product. I was wondering if you would help me setup my shopping cart, hosting, etc. Already own a .com domain name.

Brian
Hey I appreciate the offer! What are you using for the marketing site? Do they have a payment plugin?
Who is your registrar?

I don't have one yet. I bought "quadcrushgame.com" from Godaddy, but I don't want to use their hosting. I need to build a marketing site under that domain name and have it hosted. Would you be able to help me build the site and host it? How much would you charge?
I remember that you had a private server room when I met you. I'd rather give you the money than some corporate giant web hosting business. I really don't know what I'm doing and I don't want to get ripped off.  It's for a new board game that my friend and I created.

Brian
I'd rather put it on AWS than be responsible for your success 
I would sell through Stripe. You should sign up for an account and we can figure out where to put the big purchase button.

Brian
Amazon web services.
It is pretty cheap.
Oh. Yeah. Do you know anybody who can help me build and host the site? Does AWS do that too?

Brian
I don't think so. But there are plenty of site builders out there that use AWS as there host internally.
http://www.wix.com/
Free Website Builder | Create a Free Website | WIX.com
Create a free website with Wix.com. Customize with Wix' free website builder, no coding skills needed. Choose a design, begin customizing and be online today!
wix.com
Right on, bro. I'll check into all that. Thank you

Brian
Sure thing!  I've heard good things about both of those services.  I can help if you get stuck.

Brian
https://thegrid.io/
The Grid - Join the Evolution
thegrid.io
Thank you, Brian. Every little bit helps.
